name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection, served with lemon and herbs.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce topped with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Assorted fresh vegetables stir-fried to perfection with a savory sauce.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a toasted bun.

name: Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and parmesan cheese.

name: Shrimp Tacos
description: Grilled shrimp served in soft corn tortillas with cabbage slaw, avocado, and cilantro-lime sauce.

name: Vegetable Pizza
description: Delicious pizza topped with a variety of fresh vegetables and melted cheese.

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Tender chicken breasts marinated in lemon and herbs, grilled to perfection.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef served in crunchy taco shells with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, marinara sauce, vegetables, and cheese baked to perfection.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken.
